item.title: [317][Delta]::help command[317][Delta]
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if(command.startsWith("help") && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) { yell("@blu@["+playerName+"]@bla@Needs moderator assistance!"); actionInterval = 30000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); } else { sM("You need to wait 30 seconds to yell for help again"); }

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Delta]::help command[317][Delta]
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

[quote=“jacked4fun1, post:2, topic:368647”]if (command.startsWith("help") && playerRights >= 1) yell("@blu@["+playerName+"]@bla@Needs moderator assistance!"); return; }[/quote]

Erm that makes it so only mods+ can ask for help. Ironic much?

item.title: [317][Delta]::help command[317][Delta]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Hey guys. I have created a little ::help command that is really basic but unfortunataly it yells that the person needs help to the entire server. I need to know how to make it yell only to mods+ and I need to know how to put in on a 30 second timer so that players can’t spam ::help.
Here is my coding for the command.

if(command.startsWith("help")) { yell("@blu@["+playerName+"]@bla@Needs moderator assistance!"); return; }

So if you could help with this, it would be much appreciated. Thanks.

Read full topic
